title: Onboarding Quest: The Gateway Adventure
description:
This mandatory quest is your entry point into a world where your participation and loyalty are celebrated. 
Engage with our community and unlock exciting rewards as you embark on your journey through the vibrant landscape of cryptocurrency. 
Your adventure starts here Are you ready to take the plunge and become a vital part of our community? Join the quest now, and let the exploration begin!

title: Notcoiners Quest: Airdrop Alchemists
description:
Hey, Notcoin community! You’ve already snagged your magical airdrop, but the fun doesn’t stop there! Dive into the Notcoiners Quest, where the adventure continues! 
As Airdrop Alchemists, your mission is to unleash your creative spirit and earn fantastic rewards for your engagement. 
Join us for some thrilling challenges, connect with fellow alchemists, and watch your rewards sparkle as you transform your participation into treasure. Ready to conjure up some excitement? Let’s get started!

title: Linea Voyagers Quest: The LXP Expedition
description:
Calling all brave explorers! If you hold LXP, it’s time to embark on the ultimate adventure! 
Join the Linea Voyagers on a quest filled with excitement, camaraderie, and bountiful rewards. Navigate through thrilling challenges, connect with fellow voyagers, and discover the hidden treasures of the crypto universe. 
Your participation will unlock fantastic rewards, so grab your gear and let’s set sail on this epic expedition together!
